customProperties.armorEffects: Beasts of CR 5 or lower must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom save or become charmed by you when they see you. This charm ends when you or an ally attacks them.
customProperties.weaponEffects: Deals an extra damage die to beasts.
customProperties.additionalEffects: Material for Staff of the Ivory Claw (3 Plates). Carpenter's tools gain a +2 bonus while working with bone or bone-like materials.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: Beasts of CR 5 or lower must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom save or become {@condition charmed} by you when they see you. This charm ends when you or an ally attacks them.
Weapon Effects: Deals an extra damage die to beasts.
Additional Effects: Material for Staff of the Ivory Claw (3 Plates). Carpenter's tools gain a +2 bonus while working with bone or bone-like materials.
